title: Self-Defense for Radicals: A to Z Guide for Subversive Struggle
description:
Self-Defense for Radicals: A to Z Guide for Subversive Struggle 

Publisher: PM Press; Pmplt edition 
Mickey Z.
2010
Language: English
ISBN-10: 1604862041
ISBN-13: 978-1604862041
32 pages 
PDF,EPUB,MOBI 
2.22 MB

Radicals, feminists, environmentalists. Activists for animal rights, human rights, civil rights. There are plenty of rebels and dissidents putting their asses on the line. Conversely, there's never been a shortage of reactionaries seeking to repress such vision and passion. Learning how to fight and/or defend yourself is not the same as promoting belligerent, anti-social behavior. While talk of non-violence is understandable and the struggle for peace has never been more essential, let's face it: The odds are that sooner or later you're going to end up in a confrontation that may escalate into physical violence. So, why not be prepared? Self-Defense for Radicals will get you off and running in the right direction. From eye gouges to groin punchesÃ¢â‚¬â€you'll find a powerful collection of tactics with which we can fight back. Interspersed with words of wisdom and guidance from Emma Goldman, Bruce Lee, Angela Davis, and even Patrick Swayze, this pocket-sized pamphlet will inspire readers to not only speak truth to power but also deliver a sharp elbow to power's jutting jaw
